Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, The.wo: Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, The
Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, The.tr: (1950) a children's book by C. S. Lewis, in which four children enter the imaginary land of  Narnia by walking through a  wardrobe, and have many adventures there. It is the first of the series of books called The Chronicles of Narnia.
